```{r}
library(dplyr)

setwd("~/Documents/PhD/Chapter 4/Data/Phenoplate data/R analysis")
NPQ_parameters <- read.csv("Thermal Curves/NPQ_residual/exponential raw output.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)
# Only the cols we care about
NPQ_parameters <- NPQ_parameters[, c(2, 3, 4, 5)]
# Rename cols to simplify
colnames(NPQ_parameters) <- c('Sample', 'SampleGroup', 'a', 'r')
```

#test & assumptions S
```{r}
anova_r <- aov(r ~ SampleGroup, data = NPQ_parameters)
summary(anova_r)
TukeyHSD(anova_r)
#boxplot(r ~ SampleGroup, data = NPQ_parameters)

#Normality test
shapiro.test(NPQ_parameters$r)

#Histogram
hist(NPQ_parameters$r, col='steelblue')

```

# Boxplots
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(NPQ_parameters, aes(SampleGroup, r)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  christineTheme 

```
